plot: Drama about a divorcing stage couple with a dying son. During the opening night of "Death of Pierrot", she removes the tip on her rapier, but, unknowingly accidentally kills her.
title: Komödianten
plot_es: Drama about a divorcing stage couple with a dying son. During the opening night of "Death of Pierrot", she removes the tip on her rapier, but, unknowingly accidentally kills her.
